Attacks.Name: Dazzling Gleam
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Disoriented special condition, reducing their attack roll by 1 die until the end of their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Aurora Veil
Attacks.Effect: Creates a protective field. Allied characters within range 2 of Alolan Ninetales add 1 die to their defense rolls until the start of Alolan Ninetales' next activation.

Attacks.Name: Frost Breath
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Freeze special condition, reducing their movement by half during their next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Fairy Aura
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within range 3 of Alolan Ninetales roll 1 fewer die in their attack rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Ice Path Maker
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all special conditions from allied characters within range 2. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Ice Beam
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, the target character gains the Stun special condition. If a wild is rolled, apply the Stun condition to all enemy characters within range 2 of the target.

Superpowers.Name: Winter's Grace
Superpowers.Effect: Alolan Ninetales immediately gains 3 power. This superpower can be used only once per game.
